body_html: @davclark please see the ROCm fork and file issues there. Current state is that PyTorch is building on ROCm 1.8.2 (also see CI for that and the build scripts for dependencies) and is close to working. We are actively working on fixing outstanding issues.
body_text: @davclark please see the ROCm fork and file issues there. Current state is that PyTorch is building on ROCm 1.8.2 (also see CI for that and the build scripts for dependencies) and is close to working. We are actively working on fixing outstanding issues.
body: @davclark please see the ROCm [fork](https://github.com/ROCmSoftwarePlatform/pytorch) and file issues there. Current state is that PyTorch is building on ROCm 1.8.2 (also see CI for that and the build scripts for dependencies) and is close to working. We are actively working on fixing outstanding issues.
